name: Deliverance
help: Increases Damage Dealt By 5%. Effect Ends Upon Reuse.    Using Certain Actions While Under The Effect Of Deliverance Will Grant Abandon. Each Unit Of Abandon Increases Critical Hit Rate By 2%. When Five Units Are Stacked, You Will Become Uncontrollable. All Abandon Is Lost When Deliverance Ends.    Cannot Be Used With Defiance.  If Defiance Is Executed While Using Deliverance, All Abandon Is Converted Into Wrath.    Shares A Recast Timer With Defiance.
help_html: Increases Damage Dealt By 5%. Effect Ends Upon Reuse.    Using Certain Actions While Under The Effect Of Deliverance Will Grant Abandon.
